sections.heading: Overview
content: Arnold J. Haysman, RPh, graduated from the University of Georgia in 1989 with a Bachelor of Science in Pharmacy. He has been practicing pharmacy for over 25 years. He works as a staff pharmacist at Wellstar Kennestone Hospital in the inpatient pharmacy. When not working, he enjoys spending time with his wife, four kids, and pet dog.
